description: A still young ex-boxer who works as a coach in the Naniwa gym. As a boxer, he was able to achieve being the number one contender of the Japanese title, but was unable to defeat the champion which is later revealed to have been Miyata`s father. When Sendou attacked him and some rookie boxers, Yanaoka was the only one who could resist Sendou`s attacks and could even see his weak spots as a fighter. Thanks to him, Sendou joined the Naniwa gym.
name: Yanaoka Trainer
